sub_title: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path
summary:
Angelo van Stijn is a proactive, energetic and principle centered person. He has more than 15 years of global consulting and project management experience with HR System Implementations and HR Transformation Programs. Angelo has worked in various industries, including aviation, banking, chemicals, consumer products and health care. 

His range of expertise includes Project Management, HR Systems Implementation, Support Services, Change Management, Human Resources and Talent Management. Angelo is also a certified SAP SuccessFactors consultant. He has several years of experience as a global thought leader for SuccessFactors communities within leading consulting firms in the world.

Angelo holds a MBA in Human Resources from Utrecht University. He participates in several communities on his own and has a professional background in youth soccer.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

education.field_of_study: Business Administration Management, Economy and Law

certifications.name: SAP Certified Application Associate - SAP SuccessFactors Performance and Goal Management 2018
SAP Certified Application Associate - Cloud HCM Performance & Goals Management
Fusion Applications: Global Human Resources Implementation

projects.title: Busch - Program Manager MySuccessFactors
projects.description:
Busch Vacuum Solutions is one of the world’s largest producers of vacuum pumps, vacuum systems, blowers and compressors.

In his role of Program Manager Angelo was overall responsible for the EC, Time, Recruiting, Onboarding and Integrations implementation for over 40 countries.

projects.title: Maastricht University - Project Management Support eHRM
projects.description:
Maastricht University is a public research university in Maastricht, Netherlands.

In his role Angelo supported and the client side with:

- Integration Stream (including SF - SAP ECC) Facilitation:
- Conversion Stream Facilitation
- SAP SF Reporting Stream Facilitation
- Testing Coordination

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: Project Own It! - Project Manager SAP SuccessFactors at Oregon Tool
projects.description:
Oregon Tool is a global company that manufactures saw-chain and other equipment for the forestry, agriculture and construction industries.

In his role Angelo was responsible for the overall project management of the SAP SF EC implementation for 3300 employees in 11 countries including ADP and Benefitfocus integrations.

The project was successfully delivered -on time- within an 11 months timeframe.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: Peab - SAP SuccessFactors EC Support Lead
projects.description:
Peab AB is a construction and civil engineering company headquartered in Sweden.

As the SAP SF EC Support Lead Angelo was responsible for resolving EC tickets and building structure in the support model.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: Orbia Pulse - Project Manager Fit-Gap Assessment SAP SuccessFactors at Orbia
projects.description:
Orbia is a Mexican company involved in several industries, including building and infrastructure, data communications, irrigation, chemicals, and more. It has operations in 41 countries, with more than 22,000 employees.

As the project lead Angelo was responsible for managing the fit-gap assessment on SAP SuccessFactors, including Employee Central, Performance & Goals Management, and Compensation & Variable Pay.

The driver of this project was to enhance the HR processes, optimize the HRIS solutions and improve the data accuracy. 

The final deliverable was an Optimization Report including all findings and recommendations.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: SFWMD - Project Manager SAP SuccessFactors
projects.description:
The South Florida Water Management District (SFWMD) is a regional governmental district that oversees water resources from Orlando to the Florida Keys.

Angelo was responsible for the SAP SuccessFactors Project Management, including the implementation of Employee Central (including ECC integration), Recruiting Management, and Onboarding.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: MySanquin - HR IT Team Lead / Coach / ScrumMaster at Sanquin
projects.description:
Sanquin is responsible for safe and efficient blood supply in the Netherlands on a not-for-profit basis.

As the HR IT Team Lead, Angelo was responsible for refining and monitoring the Support Model in an Agile method.

In his role he facilitated the support and changes on the SAP SuccessFactors system, as well provided business analysis, scrum master activities and created a development plan for the internal SuccessFactors administrators.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: MyHR - Manager Operations SAP SuccessFactors at KLM Royal Airlines
projects.description:
KLM Royal Dutch Airlines is the flag carrier airline of the Netherlands.

As the Manager Operations, Angelo was responsible for linking the SAP SuccessFactors modules with KLM’s HR Technology landscape and HR Business Processes in an Agile model.

In his role he facilitated the support and changes on the SAP SuccessFactors system, as well provided business analysis and system configuration for Employee Central, Performance & Goals and RBP.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: M'People - Client Project Manager Europe SAP SuccessFactors at Mexichem
projects.description:
Mexichem is a global producer of plastic pipes, and is one of the largest chemical and petrochemical companies in the world. 

Angelo was responsible for the SAP SuccessFactors project management in 18 countries, including the implementation of Employee Central, Compensation & Variable Pay, Performance & Goals, Recruiting Management, LMS, Succession & Development and Time Off.

In his role he was managing all workstreams in Europe, including Functional Delivery, Data, Reporting, Change Management, Communications, Training, Governance and GDPR.

projects.title: SAP SuccessFactors EC and P&G Lead Consultant at PVH
projects.description:
PVH owns, designs, sources and markets a selection of world-renowned brands in the dress shirts, sportswear, neckwear, footwear, and accessories categories.

Angelo was responsible for the support of their SuccessFactors Employee Central and Performance & Goals (including CPM) solutions.

projects.title: SAP SuccessFactors Project Management at US Sugar
projects.description:
US Sugar is a large privately owned agricultural business based in the USA.

Angelo was responsible for managing the implementation of the SuccessFactors Performance & Goals, and Compensation solutions.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: SAP SuccessFactors Admin Trainer at Graphic Packaging International
projects.description:
Graphic Packaging International, Inc. is a Fortune 1000 corporation. It is a leading company in the design and manufacturing of packaging for commercial products.

To gain better understanding of the SuccessFactors System all European SF Admin Users were trained by Angelo. The topics included Admin, Dashboard, Reporting and Performance & Goals functionality. 

In collaboration with his US colleagues, Angelo was also involved in the creation of Quick Reference Guides and US Admin Training.

Services Sales Executive at Workday
Lead Enterprise Solution Consultant at DocuSign

projects.title: Compensation Manager at Rabobank International
projects.description:
Rabobank is a Dutch multinational banking and financial services company. It is a global leader in food and agri financing and sustainability-oriented banking.

Rabobank started the Global Reward Strategy Phase 2 project to deliver a uniform salary- and bonus structure at global level.

Angelo supports the project team in gathering the required data and analysis in which he is responsible for:

Several analysis
Liaise effectively with the HR /compensation colleagues in support of the project
Deliver timely and accurate scheduled and ad hoc reports
Ensure accurate and timely analysis
Data analysis both quantitative and qualitative
Process documentation / Update support documentation when appropriate
Perform system administration tasks
Database development and analytics in support of the project
Ad hoc duties as required

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: Global SME SuccessFactors / Thought Leader HCM Cloud at CGI
projects.description:
CGI Group Inc. is a multinational information technology (IT) consulting, systems integration, outsourcing, and solutions company. 

Angelo was initial responsible for setting up a HCM Cloud Services Stream for SuccessFactors. In his role Angelo achieved commitment in the SAP council meeting from all global SAP practice leads. In this meeting Angelo presented the objectives delivered in a mere two months and suggested next steps; 

• A global workspace available in which we share SF content, such as training material, bid    
  material and SF resources.
• A recognized global SF partner resulting in access to SF tools, such as Learning, Demo’s, etc.
• A HCM Cloud Solutions CGI LinkedIn group in which we share the latest SF developments.
• A Service Offering officially recognized by SuccessFactors.
• SF job postings.

This resulted in a nomination as the Global SME for SuccessFactors. He is the key SF contact person at CGI global level and responsible for creating and monitoring the SF engagement model and partner program.

Angelo was also member of the ERP Practice core team in the Netherlands as Thought Leader HCM Cloud solutions. In this role he was responsible for HCM Cloud training content, thought leadership and sales support.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: HR Business Consultant Sourcing HR System at Allego
projects.description:
Allego develops charging infrastructure and charging solutions tailored for municipalities, businesses and transportation.

The old HR systems (provided by Alliander) did not cover the needs of non-Dutch employees of Allego. This meant that many basic HR functions were processed manually in e-mail and Excel.  This was very time consuming and (un)intentially adverse to fraud. Alliander started a new European tender in which also international employee administration was covered. However, given the fast developments within Allego, it was highly desired to acquire an own Allego HR system, covering all specific Allego needs.

The objective for Angelo was to support the Allego team:
1. Ensure that final selected HR system met all Allego requirements
2. Reduction of Allego staff workload through active participation in the vendor / system selection  
    process
3. Providing expertise & knowledge of various HR systems including implementation

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: HR Business Consultant at Vlaamse Gemeenschapscommissie - Brussel
projects.description:
The Vlaamse Gemeenschapscommissie (or VGC, or, in English, the Flemish Community Commission) is the local representative of the Flemish authorities in the Brussels-Capital Region, one of the three regions of Belgium.

VGC decided to replace their current HR system for a new HR system. In his role Angelo was responsible for the following activities:

Analyse TO-BE processes
Analyse potential vendors
Market research

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: SuccessFactors Performance & Goals lead consultant at Schiphol
projects.description:
HR SC 3.0 was the first European HR BPO service in which several SuccessFactors modules were implemented; Employee Central (including ECSC), Compensation and Performance & Goals.

Angelo was the lead consultant for the Performance & Goals stream. The objective was to deliver a new performance system in which all Schiphol employees were included in the review cycle. The implementation included the preparation, realization and verification phases in which Angelo performed the following activities:

Prepare and lead workshops
Create functional specifications
System configuration
System delivery per iteration
Discuss test results
Sign-Off
Go Live

Besides he supported the SF Employee Central and Compensation team in several activities.

contributors.headline: Associate Partner & Managing Director NL - HR Path

projects.title: PeopleSoft HCM 9.2 consultant at CGI
projects.description:
Following the acquisition of Logica in August 2012, the recommendation to move forward with one Human Capital Management system (HCM) for all of the CGI members (including classic CGI & legacy Logica) and to use PSA HCM 9.2 as the system of choice was approved. Classic CGI was using PSA HRMS 8.0 and this was an upgrade to this current system with additional features.	
	
In this project Angelo was responsible for the PS HCM 8.0 to PS 9.2 HR related upgrade activities and gap retrofitting on a major system integration. 
	
His activities included:
•	Support on PS upgrade step activities
•	Retrofit current PS 8.0 custom functionalities & interfaces to PS 9.2 
•	System testing
•	Modules: Workforce Administration, Self-Service, Benefits and Workforce Development

projects.title: SuccessFactors Consultant at FrieslandCampina
projects.description:
FrieslandCampina was implementing both SuccessFactors Performance Management and LMS. Angelo was the Global Central Key User and responsible for supporting the Local Leads in understanding the Performance Management system and processes. Besides he was also responsible for 2nd line support of the LMS system, which include configuration, interfaces, etc.

Angelo also created a model for a new SuccessFactors Support Desk and implemented the associated processes, like change management, incident management, etc.

projects.title: Data Analyst Global Roll-out SAP HR Portal at DSM
projects.description:
The Global One HR project had the objective to achieve a clear overview of the organizational structure within DSM worldwide which needed to be implemented in the global SAP HR system for reporting purposes.

Angelo was responsible for analyzing the complete organizational structure and employee data.

profile_positions.description:
Whitaker-Taylor is a global consultancy firm with a 100% HCM technology focus (SuccessFactors and SAP HCM). Since the founding in 2007 they have grown to become one of the Tier-One Consulting Firms recognized by SAP.

Angelo have laid the foundation of the EMEA operations and as a Practice Director he is accountable for Team Management, Staffing and Resource Planning, Financial Oversight, Team Utilization, Thought Leadership, Account Management and Marketing & Business Development.

Angelo also provides HR IT Consulting and Project Management services.

www.whitakertaylor.com

HR IT Consultant PeopleSoft and Global SME SuccessFactors / Thought Leader HCM Cloud
Senior Digital HR Consultant PeopleSoft and SAP SuccessFactors
HR IT Consultant Oracle and PeopleSoft

profile_positions.description:
HR Transformation program for an Oracle HR implementation in the Netherlands, UK, Italy and Hungary. 

Angelo was responsible for gathering business and system requirements, analyzing localizations, set up roles & responsibilities and creating Web ADI Letters, Discoverer Reports and Training Documentation.

Besides he supported his colleagues in User Training, Go Live and was 2nd line support for system issues for all countries. Angelo also participated in the Single Sign On (SSO) and the 11.5.10 upgrade projects.
